page.title: 01LANGRISH AND FROXFIELD AREA
page.content:
This area is situated to the West of {Petersfield}and comprises of two hamlets-Langrish and Froxfield Green. It is an agricultural area with plenty of arable land and livestock. It is recognised as an area of outstanding natural beauty, containing numerous woods, hangers and hills. The A272 divides it into a Northern and Southern part. Being a rural area, the following topics are considered to be of the most importance for these hamlets in East Hampshire:
Introduction Attitudes Farming Religion Geology Transport Wildlife Industry Landmarks Health Lifestyles Tourism
